name: globalSettings
label: Global Settings
tooltip: These are settings that generally apply to the entire App.

values.name: pluginLoadSettings
values.label: Plugins
values.description: Select the Plugins you'd like to load at the startup of the App! These may perform operations on data, the way the App renders, or supply additional Settings! You can use built-in Plugins, or supply your own!

values.name: pluginSettings
values.label: Built-In Plugins
values.description: Select a set of Built-In Plugins to load at startup! Warning: Certain Plugins can override functionality and cause conflicts or errors, so be sure they're compatible!

values.name: customPlugins
values.label: Custom Plugins
values.description:
Enter a full URL to a Plugin path of a folder that has both plugin.js and plugin.css.
If this is supplied, the Plugins selection will be ignored.
Example: https://mywebsite.com/pluginFolder/
